meanings.definition: To remove fuel from (a vehicle or machine).
meanings.sent1: The mechanic defuelled the car before starting the repairs.
meanings.sent2: The pilot defuelled the airplane after the long flight.
meanings.sent3: The defuelled truck sputtered to a stop, out of gas.
meanings.sent4: Her determination defuelled any doubts in her mind, propelling her forward.
meanings.sent5: The defuelled generator stood silent, lacking the energy to hum.

meanings.definition: To deplete or reduce the amount of fuel in (a vehicle or machine).
meanings.sent1: The long journey defuelled the tank, leaving the car stranded.
meanings.sent2: The cold weather quickly defuelled the heating system.
meanings.sent3: The defuelled lawnmower refused to start, tired from its work.
meanings.sent4: His constant worrying defuelled his energy, leaving him drained.
meanings.sent5: The defuelled rocket failed to launch, lacking the power to soar.
